features: Deep Cleansing: This facial skin care product delves deep into your pores, exfoliating blackheads and congestion. Say goodbye to dullness and welcome a revitalized, glowing complexion that reflects the true beauty of your skin.

Refreshing Cleanser: A gel-type cleanser containing oriental herbal ingredients such as plum water, plum extract, and mung bean extract. It protects the natural barrier of skin by maintaining oil and moisture balance while wiping away wastes

Oil and Moisture Balance: Elevate your skincare regimen to new heights by safeguarding your skin's natural barrier. This cleanser strikes the perfect harmony between oil and moisture, ensuring a delicate equilibrium.

Abudant Moisture: With 24% Plum Water, this facial cleanser supplies abudant moisture to dry skin. Citric acid and natural aha ingredients that are abundantly included in plum gently exfoliate dead skin cells and activate the skin turnover cycle to help shed old cells and grow new healthy skin cells.

Great Gift: Perfect for grand parents, moms, dads, girlfriends and boyfriends as a birthday gift and event for special occasions. Present your loved ones with this ginseng cleansing oil korean skincare.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Gentle & Deep Cleansing 2 Moisturizing Gel Formula 3 Skin Radiance & Clarity

Key Ingredients 24% Plum Water Rich in organic acids and vitamins, plums have been used as herbal ingredients for generations. In our Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser, plum water softens old dead skin cells and moisturizes your skin for a radiant complexion. 3% Mung Bean Extract In addition to their exfoliating benefits, mung bean seed extract contains saponin, a natural moisturizer. It helps keep your skin moist for an extended period by promoting moisture creation, ensuring a fresh and hydrated feeling.

Is the Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser suitable for all skin types? Yes, Dynasty Cream is formulated to be suitable for all skin types, whether you have dry, oily, combination, or sensitive skin. Its versatile formula adapts to your unique skin needs. Will this cleanser help with acne-prone skin? Absolutely! Our cleanser is formulated to cleanse thoroughly without causing damage to the skin barrier. This makes it a great choice for those with acne-prone skin, as it helps maintain skin health. Is this cleanser fragrance-free and hypoallergenic? Yes, it is fragrance-free and hypoallergenic, making it ideal for sensitive skin. We understand the importance of gentle and skin-friendly products. How do I know if this product is authentic? Please make sure you are purchasing the product from the only official seller: BEAUTY OF JOSEON OFFICIAL. We can not promise the authenticity of products purchased from other sellers other than BEAUTY OF JOSEON OFFICIAL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For reference, I have very fair, sensitive skin & red hair. My skin is very picky (and is suddenly very dry because of a change in my climate).I have tried no less than 12 face washes, including “dermatologist tested” and “hypoallergenic.” This is it. This is the one. My skin absolutely loves it.No smell. Light weight. Hydrating without being oily. No breakouts yet. No dry patches, rash, or redness. Combined with the rest of my routine, this product left my skin glowy and got rid of my flaky, dry skin. Smooth & gentle, minimal foaming.It’s worth the hype.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good lightweight cleanser for dry skin.
reviews.reviewText: This was my first purchase of a Beauty of Joseon skincare product and I was excited to see what the hype was all about. I was pleasantly surprised how the brand surely lived up to its hype. This cleanser foamed up nicely and after washing it off, my skin looked bright and felt baby-soft. I would say this cleanser is great for those with sensitive or dry skin who are looking for a face wash that is light, without fragrance, and will not irritate your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it makes my skin feel really smooth without making it feel dry like i've felt with different cleansers. it's pretty gentle but cleans very well. i have sensitive skin, and it has not made me break out. if anything, it helped a LOT better than my cerave cleanser. it also doesn't have a scent (or at least not one i can smell), which is nice cause im not a huge fan of scented skin care

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very great product.
reviews.reviewText: For the past several days, this product has been effective for me—no breakouts whatsoever. It has a gel-like substance and a small amount goes a long way. It doesn't really have a scent, which is excellent, but be careful when using it close to the eye area because mine felt a little blistering. It also dries up your face, so use a nice moisturizer after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’ve found my all time cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I love foaming cleansers but hate how stripping and drying they can be. With this cleanser my skin gets that amazing foam lather and feels moisturized after, without that film feeling cream cleansers leave or the stripping of the foaming cleansers. Best of both worlds. My breakouts have seemed to be more under control also. No scent or irritating feeling on my dry sensitive skin. 10/10 will repurchase. I’m usually the type of person to switch cleansers after each bottle is finished because I never feel completely satisfied with it, not this one. I don’t know if I’ll ever switch away from this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Unscented and felt clean, good for if you have sensitive skin and need a gentle cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear skin after 1 month use!
reviews.reviewText: So I started using this product as soon as I received it on 9/18/23. When I first got it, I noticed a difference from cleansers here on the American market. It doesn't have a strong order at all, super clear with green tint, soft on skin and leaves skin soft and hydrated. I've never used makeup since my skin is super sensitive but I always had little bumps that weren't quite pimples on my forehead and just like everyone else, blackheads on my nose. I've have a noticable difference in my face since I started using this. I was not using this with a combination of any other product. I was literally starting my skin care journey.I only use it once a day at night to clean off all the dirt and oil I've accumulated on my skin throughout the day and than after cleaning my face with the cleanser, I put a sensitive skin moisturizer after. And in the morning I washed my face with regular bar soap.I love this product so much. I will continue to buy it and I recommend it to people, who just like me, didn't know where to start with a skin care routine and was. being bombarded by social media with a million different products. Funny thing is, I didn't find this on social media. Found it searching on Amazon and reading reviews lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use a more expensive face wash, but was hoping this would be a good replacement for less money. I find it is just an okay face wash. My face feels a bit dry after washing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. All the contents were leaking inside its box.
Kam schnell an und funktioniert super gut!!

reviews.reviewerName: エイプリルコンディノ
reviews.reviewText: Beauty of Joseon Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser is a refreshing and effective addition to any skincare routine. The green plum extract provides a gentle yet thorough cleanse, removing impurities without stripping the skin of its natural moisture. Its gel-like texture lathers up nicely, leaving the skin feeling clean and revitalized. Moreover, the subtle, natural scent adds a pleasant touch to the cleansing experience. If you're searching for a gentle and revitalizing cleanser, this product won't disappoint!
It feels so gentle and refreshing and is great for sensitive skin like mine! Also helps to give back hydration to the face
